attributes.action: We want tuition fees of around £3000 a year to be restored- Against tuition fees increase.
attributes.additional_details: The government has significantly cut higher education funding, and because of this, universities have to charge up to £9000 per year of tuition fees. We want the previous tuition fees that were in force before 2012 to be restored as soon as possible (if possible before the start of the next academic year (2012/2013)). Statistics shown in the media reveal that university applications have dropped severely already. "Education is a right not a privilege" and everyone should have fair access to it.
